articles.author: Joe Rao
articles.title: A tribute for the great comet observer Don Machholz (1952-2022) - Space.com
articles.description: Machholz made more visual discoveries (12) than any other American observer.
articles.content:
My heart is broken. 
I received a phone call this past Tuesday (Aug. 9) from Michele Machholz, informing me that her husband Don died early that morning. 
Donald Edward Machholz, born Oct. 7, 1952 … [+4327 chars]

articles.title: US Capitol riot Fil-Am participant who carried walis tambo sent to prison - Yahoo Philippines News
articles.description: A Filipino American carried a walis tambo while he participated in the US Capitol riot on January 6, 2021. He is now going to jail for his involvement...
articles.content: Supporters of US President Donald Trump enter the US Capitol's Rotunda on January 6, 2021, in Washington, DC. - Demonstrators breeched security and entered the Capitol as Congress debated the a 2020 … [+2373 chars]

articles.author: RNZ
articles.title: America's Cup: Sir Michael Fay, club veterans quit over Barcelona move - RNZ
articles.description: Veteran America's Cup campaigner Sir Michael Fay has resigned from the Royal NZ Yacht Squadron, in protest at the Cup's defence going offshore. He talks to Lisa Owen.
articles.content:
Veteran America's Cup campaigner Sir Michael Fay has resigned from the Royal NZ Yacht Squadron, in protest at the Cup's defence going offshore. And he is not the only one.
